title: Bishoku Tantei Akechi Goro
overview: Akechi Goro is a private investigator and his office is located near Omotesando in Tokyo. He is a big fan of gourmet food. It is very important for Akechi Goro to eat delicious food every day. A housewife visits his office as a client. She suspected her husband had an affair so she asked Akechi Goro for help.
